title: WTB T205 B.H. Sharpe in PSA 4

posts.post_title: WTB T205 B.H. Sharpe in PSA 4
posts.post_content:
The title says it all.  I am looking for a nice PSA 4 B.H. Sharpe T205 for my Rustler collection. I only need the Sharpe card to finish my team set.  Please contact me if you want to sell.

Thanks
